```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(flexdashboard)
library(maps)
library(leaflet)
library(sf)
library(plotly)
library(mapview)
library(shiny)
library(viridis)


theme_set(theme_classic())
getwd()
#meta data
sites.joined.skinny <- read.csv("../Processed/sites.joined.skinny.csv", as.is=TRUE)
sites.joined.skinny <- sites.joined.skinny %>% dplyr::select(-X)

#static df with count and date measurements
sites.summary.static <- read.csv("../Processed/sites.summary.static.csv", as.is = TRUE)
sites.summary.static$firstMeas <- as.Date(sites.summary.static$firstMeas)
sites.summary.static$lastMeas <- as.Date(sites.summary.static$lastMeas)
sites.summary.static$SiteType <- as.factor(sites.summary.static$SiteType)



countylist <- unique(sites.summary.static$CountyNm)

#gwl data
gwl.joined.skinny <- read.csv("../Processed/gwl.joined.skinny.csv",as.is=TRUE)
gwl.joined.skinny$Date<-as.Date(gwl.joined.skinny$Date)


```

Dashboard
=======================================================================


Sidebar {.sidebar}
-------------------------------------------
Identify desired attributes to narrow down sites on map

```{r}
#Agency selection
checkboxGroupInput("Agency", label = "Agency",
            choices = c("USGS", "NMBGMR", "NGWMN", "OSE", "ABQ"), selected = "USGS")

#Well Depth
sliderInput("Depth", "Well Depth (ft)",
            min = 3, max = 7218, value = c(1000,5000), step = 5)

#Number of measurements per well
sliderInput("Measurements", "Number of measurements per well",
            min = 1, max = 13000, value = c(100,12000), step = 1)

#Date of last measurement
dateRangeInput("Dates", "Date of last measurement", start = NULL, end = NULL, 
               min = "1900-05-01",max = "2019-11-08", format = "yyyy-mm-dd", 
               startview = "month", weekstart = 0, language = "en", 
               separator = " to ", width = NULL, autoclose = TRUE)

#County drop down
selectizeInput(
        'County', 'County', choices = countylist,
        multiple = TRUE, selected = NULL)
```

### Sites

```{r}

selectedData <- reactive({
  m <- subset(sites.summary.static,
              AgencyCd.x %in% input$Agency &
              WellDepth >= input$Depth[1] & WellDepth <= input$Depth[2] &
              Count >= input$Measurements[1] & Count <= input$Measurements[2] #&
              #lastMeas <= input$Dates[1] & lastMeas <= input$Dates[2] &
              #CountyNm %in% input$County
       ) 
 # if (nrow(m) == 0)
 #   m <- sites.summary.static
 # return(m)
  
  
})

output$map <- renderLeaflet({

  #palette 
  pal <- colorNumeric(viridis(999), NULL)
  
 selectedData() %>%
 leaflet() %>% 
 addTiles()%>%
 addCircleMarkers(~DecLongVa, ~DecLatVa,
                  stroke = FALSE, 
                  fillOpacity = 0.3,
                  fillColor = ~pal(WellDepth),
                  popup = ~as.character(`SiteNo`),
                  layerId = ~SiteNo) %>%
 addLegend(position = 'bottomright', pal = pal, 
                values = selectedData()$WellDepth, title = 'Well Depth (ft)')
})
leafletOutput('map')
```

### Static Example

```{r}
site1ex <- gwl.joined.skinny %>%
  filter(SiteNo == "314810106513601") 
site1ex <- site1ex %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(Date)
site1ex.plot <- site1ex %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=Date, y = Depth.to.Water.Below.Land.Surface.in.ft.)) +
  geom_point() +
  geom_line() +
  scale_y_reverse() +
  labs(y="Depth to Water (ft)")
            
print(site1ex.plot) 
ggplotly(site1ex.plot)
```

### Click on a point to see groundwater levels

```{r}

click_marker <- eventReactive(input$map_marker_click, {
  
  x<-input$map_marker_click
  y<-x$id
  return(y)
})

 plot_data <- reactive({
  
  
 # Fetch data for the clicked tract
  
 return(gwl.joined.skinny[gwl.joined.skinny$SiteNo == click_marker(), ])
  
  
 })
 output$well <- renderPlotly({
   p <- ggplot(plot_data(), aes(x=Date, y = Depth.to.Water.Below.Land.Surface.in.ft.)) +
     geom_point() + geom_line() + scale_y_reverse() +
     labs(y="Depth to Water (ft)")
   ggplotly(p)
   
 })
plotlyOutput('well')

```
